Perceptor:

PErceptor tied tightly Tucson's Nightshift's Hands in their bac=
ks, Hydras smiled pleased and said "Now that is done... it's time to scort =
you to your new rooms" 

Hydras walked towards the dungeos areas while Perc=
eptor iamed the prisioners and Pushed roughly Nightshift encuoragint him to=
 move

hoogroups.com

Tucson Prime was proud of Ra=
t Trap's accomplishments the first time, so to that he grins for a short mo=
ment with a quick chuckle. Yet, he gives his hands to Perceptor to cooperat=
e with him. Night Shift on the other hand also gives his hands up for cuffi=
ng but gives Perceptor a dirty look.

" I so hope you sanitized your mitts =
before touchn' me. Never know where they've been, especially when ya can't =
see worth a slag in front of your face."

Tucson snaps his neck at Night Sh=
ift.

"Night Shift, no. Refrain from making comments. It will only make mat=
ters worse."

Night Shift nodds.

"Sorry boss, couldn't resist."

Tucson se=
nds a message to Rat Trap and Quick Stride via com link.

"Rat Trap, if you=
 two are still in the area, I suggest you retreat immediately, I repeat, re=
treat immediately."

The message is reached as Rat Trap remounts on Quickst=
ride's back.

"No worries Rat Trap, I know a short cut back ta the Ark!"

T=
he effects of the bean pods, ferments in his stomach, as Rat Trap pinches h=
is nose.

" Talk about hazardous fumes! PU! Quickstride!"

The horse bends =
his ears back as he makes a dash for it.

" Sorry. Hey, I pitty the predaco=
n who tries to tail me." 

On fast hooves, Quickstride takes the shortcut a=
nd attempts to pull away from the fortress parameter.

ore having to be separated from them.

her.

g really stinks around here doesn't it, and it's not me this time, because =
I haven't had any bean pods lately."

ight away, ta call for backup. Lord Elder, it's me, Rat Trap. Wheels hasn't=

g's wrong. I think we need backup sir."

de could see what was happening. He puts his nose down to his rodent comrad=
e.

e's pretty buff now Rat Trap. Don't worry, I bet he's got somethn' up his m=
anifold. It's just gonna take a while, that's all."

himself and scrambles up onto Quickstride's back.

place ta hide."

nery near the black fortress. He trots toward it, vanishing into the vegita=
